channel.title: Client Help
channel.description:
Hey, I was wondering if someone could help me.
I wanted to know if someone can help me add the runescape background for my client with moving flames. Also, where would I add it and such.
Also, when trying to compile my client I get this..
The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .
I also get this, Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Press any key to continue . . .
When I try to run it

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @dedripper dedripper
item.description:
@dedripper wrote:

you need to set your classpath

Read full topic
